title: Remove this fucking item, your game has gone downhill since its inception
body:
{{item:3147}} 
The game has literally gone to complete trash since this item was created and all the ones who abused it have been nothin but trouble in solo Q. who cares about pro play and how viable shitssins are when they are ruining the game for your player base that keeps your game running. stop buffing the champs who abuse this item an delete it permantly and gut kha zix, zed, talon, rengar, kayn and everyone else who abuses it.

replies.body:
He's not WRONG...

Not sure it's the problem, but he's not wrong.

Is he?

He opens saying Duskblade needs to be removed, then later says that all ad assassins who use it should be gutted.

I don't understand this logic, if the problem is duskblade, the champs wont need nerfing, if they do need nerfing anyway, then does that mean it's really duskblade causing the problems?

I get the feeling this is the kind of person who will sit incredibly far up the lane with no vision as a squishball adc, expecting he can compete with champions who are literally designed to pick off isolated targets quickly and efficiently.

Contrary to what everyone seems to believe, Assassins don't magically 1-shot people out of nowhere. They 1-shot people out of nowhere after getting a few kills, and maintaining that lead. Until that point, most of them have perfectly reasonable counterplay that it's more on you if you die to them.

Adding to this, I could have sworn that the entire reason DuskBlade was added to the game in the first place was to purposely give AD assassins an item that they needed to rely on, and therefore could be used as an extra balancing lever for them.
There are bigger problems than gankblade of zedtharr.
If they remove duskblade and remove true damage from conqueror the game would be a lot more playable ....
Why, you are not explaining why Conqueror or Duskblade are problematic
Because it doesnt matter how many defenses tanks build they still get melted in matter of 2 seconds.

You know why Conqueror was released in the first place ?

Because some bruisers lacked a keystone and were being beated up by tanks in pure 1vs1 while also having more teamfight pressence.

Bruisers counter tanks, that how it should be and that's how it is since Conqueror, and it's not like Conqueror is used by everyone, you dont usuario count more than 1 Conque per te on your games.

But now it’s just generally as good as other runes at base armor values, and then gets crazy when anyone looks at getting armor. 

It should be a niche keystone instead of a generic generalist rune.

You know, i'm looking through champion statistics and i'm not seeing "complete garbage"(aside from akali). I'm seeing a bunch of reasonable(49-51%) winrate champions with respectable pickrates. Admittedly they aren't currently the most picked champions right now(mid lane at least, jungle is another story). 

But i'm not really seeing a problem with the post. If duskblade gets removed, champions will have the damage compensated in more healthy ways than a point and click nuke of an AA. Just because something isn't in the forefront of the meta does not mean it cannot use work to be more healthy to play as and against.

''I'm not seeing a problem with this post''. There is a problem: OP wants ad assassins to get gutted while there's only 1 that shines currently. Assassins arent strong in this meta but the boards prefer to bitch about them over someone whos actually oppressive and op like Galio/Liss, simply because Galio isnt an assassin (but his dmg output is like one tho lol).

> You only analyze winrates and for Platinum aswell.

No, I look at both plat+ stats and diamond+ stats. I look at KR, CN, EU, and global champion statistics.

>boards prefer to bitch about them over someone whos actually oppressive and op like Galio/Liss,

First off- How is lissandra oppressive? She's good at being able to deny an enemy a snowball, not completely dominate lanes like other champions can.

Second, The reason the boards complains about this is because they don't like playing against it and they perceive it as "op" or "broken". They may be fine with playing against champions like galio, but not the ones they post about. That's fine, they're entitled to their opinion. 

It's also important to note that something doesn't have to be broken to be be unhealthy- EG. Old akali wasn't overpowered, but she was extremely unhealthy.

Not to mention all lethality items. Or just remove the lethality on them in general.

Honestly, Duskblade probably wouldn't be that bad if it wasn't for the lethality on it. Sure, the passive could still use less damage more than likely, but when it can basically do true damage to an adc/mage/support, then it's a problem. Remove lethality and it becomes less of a problem.

Also, this game was going downhill ever since Runes Reforged. Not because they added Duskblade.

So what does seem to be the problem?

Everyone just rushes their damage and mages just go for their ludens,  some irelias just go for sheen when they allready can't survive a full combo from enemy lane etc. Even if tanks suck at the moment a little bit of resistances or hp help, and some people need to understand your counter play does not necessarily  come from your skill set, but from your build options.
